name: achievement_points
displayName: I am One in a Million, and There Are Six Thousand People in the World Exactly Like Me
description: Awarded for racking up over 999,999.999 points total.

name: achievement_128
displayName: I Have Jumped Beyond the Powers of Two, and Have Lived to Tell the Tale

name: achievement_4096
displayName: I Avoid Sleep Wherever Possible, So I Played AaaaaAAaaaAAAaaAAAAaAAAAA!!! a Whole Lot

name: achievement_plates
displayName: I Have Broken More Glass Than a Finely Corpulent Opera Singer, and Love Myself For It

name: achievement_kisses
displayName: I am at Risk of Contracting Mononucleosis, Which is Known Colloquially as the Kissing Disease
description: This achievement is an award which is awarded for achieving 10,000 kisses total.

name: achievement_fives
displayName: The Rhylos and Skaery Memorial Achievement, for Which We Will Honor Them
description: All fives. All five stars. On all levels. 81 levels. Yeah.

name: achievement_allawesome
displayName: I Have Completed Every Single of the New Levels and Can Honestly Say That I am Awesome
description: Complete the 43 new levels in Awesome. You know, the lower levels? When you click on the down arrow from the level selection screen. Those levels.

name: achievement_68kisses
displayName: One Fewer Than a Lewd Innuendo Because We Are Totally Past That Phase
description: Get exactly 68 kisses in one level. Not 67, unless you then get the 68th. 70 is right out.

name: achievement_keyendurance
displayName: OooooOOoooOOOooOOOOoOOOOO!!! -- O Ooooooooo Ooooooooo ooo Ooooooo
description: Geez. So, like, you're parachuting, and your velocity has decreased to the point where you're probably not going to die, right? So, what do you do? Have a sandwich? What if you held the O key down long enough? You could get this achievement. Or, you could say, "Oh, I don't want to do that." That is also okay. Also, Ichiro says that if you e-mail Owlchemy Labs customer support with the phrase "Alex is nude," it'd be a good way to mess with them. Pretty lousy thing for us to say, given that Owlchemy spent a lot of time working on this game, right? That's life. It's real. It's raw!

name: achievement_winter_2011
displayName: I Have Come to The Point in My Life Where I Appreciate Christmas Mall Music
